testCase.name: ServiceProviderComponent should initialize form and countries
ServiceProviderComponent should patch form with provider data
ServiceProviderComponent should set language from localStorage on init
ServiceProviderComponent should set default language to en if no lang in localStorage
ServiceProviderComponent should update responsiveClass based on breakpoint
ServiceProviderComponent should save valid new provider
ServiceProviderComponent should save valid new provider with generated ID
ServiceProviderComponent should handle invalid form in saveProvider
ServiceProviderComponent should handle localStorage error in saveProvider
ServiceProviderComponent should handle invalid localStorage data in saveProvider
ServiceProviderComponent should handle provider ID not found
ServiceProviderComponent should cancel form and close popup
ServiceProviderComponent should cancel form without closing popup
ServiceProviderComponent should initialize without provider data
